trans-unit.source: Keep your car looking great by washing it regularly.

seg-source.mrk: Keep your car looking great by washing it regularly.

target.mrk: Keep your car looking great by washing it regularly.

trans-unit.source: Move the car onto the driveway.

seg-source.mrk: Move the car onto the driveway.

target.mrk: Move the car onto the driveway.

trans-unit.source: Attach the water hose to a spout and pull the free end over to the car.

seg-source.mrk: Attach the water hose to a spout and pull the free end over to the car.

target.mrk: Attach the water hose to a spout and pull the free end over to the car.

trans-unit.source: Fill a bucket with soapy water.

seg-source.mrk: Fill a bucket with soapy water.

target.mrk: Fill a bucket with soapy water.

trans-unit.source: Use a sponge to apply the soapy water to the car and scrub off the dirt.

seg-source.mrk: Use a sponge to apply the soapy water to the car and scrub off the dirt.

target.mrk: Use a sponge to apply the soapy water to the car and scrub off the dirt.

trans-unit.source: Rinse the car by spraying clean water from the hose.

seg-source.mrk: Rinse the car by spraying clean water from the hose.

target.mrk: Rinse the car by spraying clean water from the hose.

trans-unit.source: Dry the car using a dampened chamois.

seg-source.mrk: Dry the car using a dampened chamois.

target.mrk: Dry the car using a dampened chamois.
